dialog: Festival day. The chai flows, the customers flock...
This is too good to be true.
Excuse me, who’s running this stall?
Is it too late to run?
Smile and serve chai. Maybe they’ll just buy a cup...
tamil_dialog: "சிரித்து சாயை பரிமாறவும். ஒருவேளை அவர்கள் ஒரு கப் வாங்குவார்கள்..."

dialog: And that’s when things got... complicated.
